title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-6.7 - Account error
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-6.7 - Account error

State Regulations

The department or its agent may, at its sole discretion
and on his or her own motion, correct any error in any
CO
2
allowance tracking system account. Within 10
business days of making such correction, the department or its agent will
notify the CO
2
authorized account representative for the
account. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-6.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
